Reviews.Title: Works great for small travel trailer
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: Installed on locking swing mount in 15' travel trailer.Clear screen and images, lightweight. Runs good off of 12v, doesn't seem to kill the battery too fast.Multiregiom out of the box too was a nice surprise.

ProductInfo.Features:
24" Widescreen HD LED TV. Slim LED Design
Built-in Full Function DVD Player. Resolution: 1920x1080
High Definition Digital ATSC TV Tuner. Aspect Ratio: 16:9
Brightness: 350 cd/m2. Contrast Ratio: 1000:1
1080p Full HD Capability. HDTV Signal Capability: 480p/720p/1080p
ProductInfo.Name: NAXA NTD-2453 24" Class FHD LED HDTV with Built-in Digital Tuner & DVD Player
